statements: SELECT * FROM VideoFootageMetadata;
SELECT video_id, camera_id, detected_emotion FROM VideoFootageMetadata WHERE person_id = 1;
SELECT camera_id, frame_number FROM VideoFootageMetadata WHERE detected_emotion = 'happy' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT video_id, frame_number FROM VideoFootageMetadata WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-01-31';
SELECT person_id, COUNT(*) AS total_videos FROM VideoFootageMetadata GROUP BY person_id HAVING total_videos > 5;
SELECT * FROM VideoFootageMetadata WHERE person_id = 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT video_id, timestamp, camera_id FROM VideoFootageMetadata WHERE detected_emotion = 'happy' ORDER BY frame_number ASC;
SELECT camera_id, COUNT(*) AS footage_count FROM VideoFootageMetadata GROUP BY camera_id;
SELECT person_id, detected_emotion FROM VideoFootageMetadata WHERE camera_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC, frame_number DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT person_id, detected_emotion FROM VideoFootageMetadata WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY person_id, detected_emotion DESC;
SELECT * FROM VideoFootageMetadata WHERE people_count > 5;
SELECT video_id, location FROM VideoFootageMetadata WHERE flagged = TRUE;
SELECT camera_id, timestamp FROM VideoFootageMetadata ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM FacialRecognition WHERE detected_emotion = 'happy';
SELECT video_id, detected_emotion, confidence FROM FacialRecognition WHERE confidence > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM VideoFootageMetadata WHERE people_count > 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT camera_id, location FROM VideoFootageMetadata WHERE flagged = true;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_faces, detected_emotion FROM FacialRecognition GROUP BY detected_emotion ORDER BY total_faces DESC;
SELECT video_id, timestamp, MAX(confidence) AS max_confidence FROM FacialRecognition GROUP BY video_id, timestamp;
SELECT * FROM VideoFootageMetadata INNER JOIN FacialRecognition ON VideoFootageMetadata.video_id = FacialRecognition.video_id WHERE detected_age > 30 AND confidence > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM VideoMetadata WHERE duration > 100
SELECT footage_name, timestamp FROM VideoMetadata ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT video_id, COUNT(face_id) AS face_count FROM FacialRecognition GROUP BY video_id HAVING face_count > 5
SELECT system_id, system_name, location FROM SecuritySystem ORDER BY system_name
SELECT video_id, face_data->'emotion' AS emotion FROM FacialRecognition WHERE confidence_score > 0.8
SELECT video_id, footage_name, timestamp, duration FROM VideoMetadata WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT face_id, video_id, face_data, confidence_score FROM FacialRecognition WHERE confidence_score > 0.8 ORDER BY confidence_score DESC;
SELECT system_id, system_name, location FROM SecuritySystem ORDER BY system_name;
SELECT video_id, footage_name, timestamp FROM VideoMetadata WHERE duration > 60 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT system_id, system_name, location FROM SecuritySystem WHERE system_name LIKE 'Se%' ORDER BY system_id;
SELECT * FROM security_system_videos;
SELECT video_url, video_length FROM security_system_videos WHERE facial_recognition_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT video_id, video_url FROM security_system_videos ORDER BY video_length DESC;
SELECT video_id, COUNT(capture_id) AS capture_count FROM video_capture_data GROUP BY video_id HAVING capture_count > 5;
SELECT metadata_id, video_id, analysis_time FROM video_analysis_metadata WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%burglary%';
SELECT video_url, video_length FROM security_system_videos WHERE facial_recognition_enabled = true;
SELECT * FROM video_capture_data ORDER BY capture_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(capture_id) FROM facial_recognition_results WHERE recognized_faces @> ARRAY[2] AND unrecognized_faces @> ARRAY[];
SELECT DISTINCT video_id FROM video_analysis_metadata WHERE analysis_result ILIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM security_system_videos INNER JOIN video_analysis_metadata ON security_system_videos.video_id = video_analysis_metadata.video_id;
SELECT * FROM footage_metadata;
SELECT footage_id, timestamp, resolution FROM footage_metadata WHERE camera_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM facial_recognition WHERE person_id = 'e734aa85-23ab-4b89-a14b-f38fb96e945e';
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM persons WHERE birthdate > '1990-01-01';
SELECT event_type, event_timestamp FROM events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM footage_metadata ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM persons WHERE birthdate > '1990-01-01' AND gender = 'Male'
SELECT location, model FROM cameras WHERE status = 'Active'
SELECT recognition_id, person_id, result FROM facial_recognition WHERE recognition_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT event_type, event_timestamp, location FROM events JOIN cameras ON events.camera_id = cameras.camera_id
